hero.title: Reconstruct your years of deep industry insights into digital skills, transforming professional wisdom into core tradable intellectual property for the AI era.
hero.subtitle: Here, personal intelligence is no longer an isolated experience; it becomes a global, value-adding nexus of wisdom that breaks knowledge boundaries through digital technology.
hero.tag1_desc: Built on standardized skill interface designs, ensuring your expertise seamlessly powers various mainstream AI Agentsâ€”publish once, deploy everywhere.
hero.tag2_desc: Leveraging a decentralized, minimalist transaction architecture, we minimize friction costs to near zero, ensuring the full value of your creation returns to you.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1_desc: Activate your expert identity instantly via Google or GitHub. Configure your Crypto wallet address or QR code to ensure your earnings are secure, borderless, and delivered directly to you.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Transform your professional expertise into tangible AI skills (Prompts, Workflows, or Model Parameters). Use our intuitive editor to set your pricing, describe features, and upload your digital assets.
howItWorks.step3_desc: Once approved, your skills enter the My Skill Shop library. Buyers pay you directly; once payment is confirmed, the system triggers delivery, realizing the true value of your digital copyright.
howItWorks.step4_desc: Grow your reputation and establish a premier professional brand. In this AI-driven future, turn your intellectual property into a 'value engine' that generates stable, long-term passive income.

footer.text: My Skill Shop empowers everyone to create, submit, and sell exclusive industry skills. We are dedicated to helping you reconstruct fragmented wisdom into systematic digital property through digital copyright technology, bringing you long-term and substantial economic returns while leading the intelligent revolution.
